name: Bad Breakout Clone
description:
This is literally just a breakout clone from a tutorial I followed on youtube.

Unlike the tutorial I made 4 full levels that progressively get more expansive as you progress. I also made some custom "music" which is honestly pretty bad but I'm not a musician. Hopefully your ears can forgive me. I decided to add power ups as well, which will help you in different ways.

One thing I should add is I completed this project maybe 1 and a half to 2 years ago, so this has been finished for some time, but I never really thought of uploading it until now. Enjoy!
